maximum entropy calculation engine¶

The 1984 Skilling and Bryan paper is available online from NASA: PDF

sbmaxent

Entropy maximization routine as described in the article J Skilling and RK Bryan; Mon Not R Astr Soc 211 (1984) 111 - 124. (“Mon Not R Astr Soc” is the “Monthly Notices of the Royal Astronomical Society”)

This program is a translation from the C which is from the FORTRAN which is from the BASIC version.

f ( f(r)dr)
